DataElement.preferredName: Institutional Biosafety Committee Expedited Report Submission Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether an expedited report was submitted to an institutional-level board mandated by federal law for oversight of recombinant DNA research and work involving biohazardous agents taking place at that institution (IBC).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Institutional Biosafety Committee Expedited Report Submission
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An institutional-level board mandated by federal law for oversight of recombinant DNA research and work involving biohazardous agents taking place at that institution.  They are charged with assessing the risk of research to the environment and to public health.  The board must have at least five members, with at least one with recombinant DNA expertise; at least two members must be unaffiliated with the institution._A report or observation of one or more adverse events that must be submitted within a specified amount of time due to the severity of one or more of the events._The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An institutional-level board mandated by federal law for oversight of recombinant DNA research and work involving biohazardous agents taking place at that institution.  They are charged with assessing the risk of research to the environment and to public health.  The board must have at least five members, with at least one with recombinant DNA expertise; at least two members must be unaffiliated with the institution.

Concepts.definition: An institutional-level board mandated by federal law for oversight of recombinant DNA research and work involving biohazardous agents taking place at that institution. They are charged with assessing the risk of research to the environment and to public health. The board must have at least five members, with at least one with recombinant DNA expertise; at least two members must be unaffiliated with the institution.

Property.preferredDefinition: A report or observation of one or more adverse events that must be submitted within a specified amount of time due to the severity of one or more of the events.:Submitted; referred for judgment or consideration.

Concepts.definition: A report or observation of one or more adverse events that must be submitted within a specified amount of time due to the severity of one or more of the events.
The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support CCR clinical trial build in C3D.
